sys_hub_flow.description: Close and log overdue NeedIt Tasks. Create follow up NeedIt Task for manager.
sys_hub_flow.name: Handle Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_flow_input.label: NeedIt task
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_ea179bee0702701029a8f0269c1ed0ee

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Reason
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_ea179bee0702701029a8f0269c1ed0ee

sys_hub_flow_output.label: Follow-up tasks
sys_hub_flow_output.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_output_ea179bee0702701029a8f0269c1ed0ee

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Log the reason a NeedIt task was closed.
Sets State of NeedIt record to Closed incomplete & add a Reason to Work notes.
Creates a new task, Assigned to Fred Luddy, describing the need to look into the closed incomplete overdue task.

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=NeedIt Task was not closed in a timely manner^description=Identify cause for overdue NeedIt Task {{subflow.needit_task.number}}^assigned_to={"display":"Fred Luddy","value":"5137153cc611227c000bbd1bd8cd2005"}

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Assigns the new NeedIt task record (3 > NeedIt Task Record) as output variable.
